titleStmt.title: Christian tranquility, or, The government of the passions of joy and grief in a sermon preached at Shenton in Leicestershire, upon the occasion of the much lamented death of that hopeful young gentleman, Mr. Francis Wollatson ... / by John Cave ...
titleStmt.author: Cave, John, d. 1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
